summary.span: 作為充當 (或者其他伺服器或使用者) 控制項容器之所有區域控制項的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for (or other server or user) controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 組件控制項集合中，區域會是複合控制項，轉譯為 HTML 表格，包含 Web 網頁的區域中的其他控制項。In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control, rendered as an HTML table, that contains other controls in a defined region of a Web page. 類別是繼承自基底的區域類別，並提供衍生區域，其中包含一組基底行為控制項、 伺服器控制項和使用者控制項。The class is a zone that inherits from the base class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain controls, server controls, and user controls. 組合區域與（和其他伺服器） 控制項 form 的 Web 組件的應用程式，大部分的情況與使用者互動的頁面的標準模式的主要 UI。The combination of zones with (and other server) controls forms the primary UI of a Web Parts application, the normal view of a page that users interact with most of the time. 所有區域會都提供一組常用的 UI 項目，其所包含的控制項。All zones provide a common set of UI elements for the controls they contain. 通用於所有區域的 UI 元素的詳細討論，請參閱適用於類別概觀主題類別。For a detailed discussion of the UI elements common to all zones, see the class overview topic for the class. 區域包含主體區段，其中包含伺服器控制項和相關聯物件用於呈現所包含的控制項和其組件區塊項目，例如其動詞命令、 框線和等等。The zone includes a body section that contains server controls, and an associated object used for rendering the contained controls and their chrome elements, such as their verbs, borders, and so on. 除了繼承自的功能之外類別，類別將用戶端控制項拖曳 [收件者]、 特定的動詞命令 （以啟用一般 UI 動作例如降至最低，關閉、 刪除和編輯控制項） 及其他樣式功能。In addition to the features inherited from the class, the class adds client-side control dragging, specific verbs (to enable common UI actions such as minimizing, closing, deleting, and editing controls), and additional style features. 類別也是如果您想要設計自訂的區域是由資料庫所驅動，繼承自的類別。The class is also the class to inherit from if you want to design a custom zone that is database-driven. 例如，您可以建立自訂的氣象 Web 組件區域繼承自，而且設計成包含且提供版面配置功能和其他服務的為資料繫結並顯示天氣資訊的控制項。For example, you could create a custom weather Web Parts zone that inherits from , and is designed to contain and provide layout features and other services for controls that are data-bound and display weather information. 類別包含數個屬性使用的區域中的樣式屬性。The class contains a number of properties for working with style attributes in a zone. 有幾個屬性框線，包括和。There are several properties for borders, including and . 沒有一組可以這類的區域中，標頭中出現的功能表的樣式屬性所使用的屬性， ，和其他人。There is a group of properties for working with style attributes of menus that can appear in the header of a zone, such as , , and others. 類別也包含許多成員來處理區域動詞命令。The class also contains a number of members for handling verbs in a zone. 這些成員與相關的區域中的部分控制項顯示的動詞命令。These members relate to the verbs that appear on the part controls in the zone. 雖然可以加入區域層次動詞區域，依預設它們並沒有任何。While zone-level verbs can be added to zones, by default they do not have any. 沒有設定以用於組件控制項的 Web 組件控制項所提供的標準動詞命令集合，開發人員可以加入自訂的動詞命令。There is a set of standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set for use with part controls, and developers can add custom verbs as well. 使用動詞命令的一些重要屬性包括參考某些一個標準動詞的物件，這類的屬性， ， ，以及， ，和。Some important properties for working with verbs include properties that reference some of the standard verb objects, such as , , , and , , and . 標準動作，例如會出現在 （通常是顯示在 UI 中以下拉式選單） 動詞命令功能表中，區域中包含的每個控制項的標題列中。The standard verbs appear on a verbs menu (typically presented in the UI as a drop-down menu) in the title bar of each control contained in a zone. 另外還有可讓您判斷哪些類型的可點按物件代表在 UI 中的動詞命令的屬性。There is also a property that allows you to determine what type of clickable object represents a verb in the UI. 使用動詞命令的其他索引鍵成員包括方法，也就是可以覆寫的動詞建立程序的自訂處理的事件處理常式，而事件。Other key members for working with verbs include the method, which is an event handler that can be overridden for custom handling of the verb creation process, and the event. 類別包含的成員數目使用區域內所包含的控制項。The class contains a number of members for working with controls contained within a zone. 屬性參考的所有集合（和其他伺服器） 的區域中的控制項。The property references the collection of all (and other server) controls in the zone. 數個方法會對應至使用者可以在上執行的標準動詞或動作控制項，是在區域中，例如， ，和。Several methods correspond to the standard verbs or actions that a user can carry out on controls in a zone, such as , , and . 另外還有中的成員數目類別該考量如何配置或區域內排列控制項。There are also a number of members in the class that concern how the controls are laid out or arranged within the zone. 屬性會決定控制項是否可以在區域之間移動或重新排列在區域內的使用者。The property determines whether controls can be moved among zones or rearranged within a zone by users. 屬性可讓您判斷區域中的控制項是否要水平或垂直排列。The property allows you to determine whether the controls in a zone are arranged horizontally or vertically. > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer 可能會呈現的高度或其包含的控制項，以非預期的方式，根據區域的方向。Internet Explorer might render the height of a or its contained controls in an unexpected way, depending on the orientation of the zone. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件或屬性。For more details, see the documentation for the or the properties. 中的其他方法類別會將您提供的轉譯區域的不同區域的詳細程式設計控制。Other methods in the class provide you with detailed programmatic control over the rendering of the various areas of a zone. 許多這些方法的覆寫繼承自基底方法類別，以自訂的區域，其中包含轉譯控制項。Many of these methods override the base methods inherited from the class, to customize the rendering for zones that contain controls. 重要的方法包括， ， ，和。Important methods include , , , and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 程式碼會示範如何在衍生類別，用於以宣告方式在 Web 組件頁面以包含控制項。The code shows how a derived class, , is used declaratively in a Web Parts page to contain controls. 在程式碼範例具有四個區段： 前三個章節描述程式碼檔案，和第四個說明如何執行程式碼。The code example has four sections: the first three sections describe the code files, and the fourth explains how to run the code. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者切換至不同的顯示模式的頁面。The first part of the code example is a user control that enables users to switch the page into different display modes. 如需有關 Web 組件的顯示模式，以及描述此控制項中的程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說：變更顯示模式，在 Web 組件頁面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on Web Parts display modes and a description of the code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#10)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是包含程式碼來處理事件，主要的 Web 網頁的程式碼除外檔案。The second part of the code example is a code-beside file that contains the code to handle events for the main Web page. 此檔案的程式碼示範如何使用的一些重要成員以程式設計的方式。The code in this file shows how to work with some of the key members programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview.vb#4)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是包含網頁控制項的行為自基底類別，和區域中所包含的控制項。The third part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls that exhibit behavior from the base class, and controls contained in the zones. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview_vb.aspx#1)] 載入網頁瀏覽器中。Load the Web page in a browser. 使用**顯示模式**切換成設計模式的頁面，請按一下下拉式清單控制項控制項，以及可見的區域之間拖曳的嘗試。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page into design mode, click the controls, and try dragging them between the visible zones. 某些頁面，以查看使用中的各個成員的結果上的按鈕按一下類別。Click some of the buttons on the page to see the effect of using various members of the class. 接下來，切換至編輯模式的頁面。Next, switch the page to edit mode. 請確定控制項放置在`WebPartZone2`，按一下動詞命令功能表控制項的標題列，然後按一下**編輯**編輯控制項。Make sure a control is positioned in `WebPartZone2`, click the verbs menu on the control's title bar, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 完成編輯該控制項，然後編輯其中一個其他區域中的控制項。Finish editing that control, and then edit one of the controls in the other zone. 當您執行下列步驟，請注意控制項，以及區域，UI 樣式中的差異是使用各類成員的效果類別。As you carry out these steps, notice the differences in the UI styles of the controls and the zones, which are the effect of using the various members of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性在區域處於所在區域中控制項的配置可以變更，例如網頁顯示模式時才會生效。The property takes effect only when a zone is in a page display mode in which the layout of controls in the zone can be changed, such as . 當設為`false`在指定的區域中，有一些使用者無法在區域中控制項上執行的動作：When is set to `false` on a given zone, there are a number of actions that end users are prevented from carrying out on controls in the zone: - 使用者無法將控制項拖曳至不同的區域、 重新排列控制項內的區域，或將控制項移至區域。Users cannot drag controls to a different zone, rearrange controls within the zone, or move controls into the zone. - 屬性會影響使用者介面 (UI) 的數目區域中的控制項已停用，如此使用者無法編輯這些屬性，而所編輯的控制項使用和控制項。A number of properties that affect the user interface (UI) of controls in the zone are disabled so that users cannot edit those properties while the control is being edited using the and controls. - 使用者無法將新的控制項，加入從區域控制項。Users cannot add new controls to the zone from a control. - 關閉、 刪除、 降到最低，並還原動詞命令不會顯示在區域中的控制項上。The close, delete, minimize, and restore verbs are not shown on controls in the zone. 雖然屬性影響使用者的能力，若要變更的區域，以透過使用者介面版面配置，而不會影響能夠以程式設計方式變更版面配置。Although the property affects end users' ability to change the layout of a zone through the UI, it does not affect the ability to change the layout programmatically. 例如，如果設定為`false`，使用者無法關閉的區域中的控制項，但開發人員仍然可以呼叫方法以關閉以程式設計方式控制。For example, if is set to `false`, users cannot close controls in the zone, but a developer could still call the method to close controls programmatically. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的宣告式用法屬性上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例中，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 請注意，屬性設定為`true`，這是預設值。Notice that the property is set to `true`, which is the default. 如果您將值變更為`false`，瀏覽器中載入頁面後，當您切換到設計模式中顯示的頁面時，您將無法將控制項拖曳內或`WebPartZone2`區域。If you change the value to `false`, after you load the page into a browser and switch the page into design display mode, you will not be able to drag controls within or into the `WebPartZone2` zone. remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底屬性會覆寫類別來設定區域框線的預設色彩。The base property is overridden by the class to set a default color for zone borders. 您可以設定屬性控制以宣告方式或以程式設計的方式。You can set the property for a control either declaratively or programmatically. 只有區域處於時所在的網頁顯示模式會顯示的框線類別的使用者介面 (UI) 功能是可見的例如或。The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as or . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的宣告式用法屬性上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例中，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 請注意，屬性設定為特定的具名色彩。Notice that the attribute is set to a specific named color. 在瀏覽器中載入網頁，並切換到設計模式中顯示的頁面之後，您可以看到屬性的效果。After you load the page into a browser and switch the page into design display mode, you can see the effect of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底屬性會覆寫類別來設定區域的預設框線寬度。The base property is overridden by the class to set the default border width for zones. 您可以設定屬性控制以宣告方式或以程式設計的方式。You can set the property for a control either declaratively or programmatically. 只有區域處於時所在的網頁顯示模式會顯示的框線類別的使用者介面 (UI) 功能是可見的例如或。The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as or . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的宣告式用法屬性上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例中，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 請注意，屬性值設為指定的寬度，單位為像素。Notice that the attribute value is set to a specific width in pixels. 在瀏覽器中載入網頁，並切換到設計模式中顯示的頁面之後，您可以看到屬性的效果。After you load the page into a browser and switch the page into design display mode, you can see the effect of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所參考的關閉動詞屬性會出現在每個動詞命令功能表區域中的控制項。The close verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs menu of each control in a zone. 關閉的控制項，則會從互動在頁面上，雖然如果開發人員提供適當的使用者介面 (UI)，例如區域，其中包含控制項，使用者可以切換至頁面並加入先前的關閉的頁面控制項的執行個體。Closing a control removes it from interaction on a page, although if developers provide the appropriate user interface (UI), such as a zone that contains a control, a user can switch the page into and add a previously closed instance of a control back to the page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 此程式碼範例才能運作，您需要的範例區段的所有程式碼屬性。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 程式碼範例的下列部分會是部分類別中，來自，且包含切換說明動詞命令為啟用或停用的程式碼。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the help verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 在程式碼範例中的其他部分是裝載自訂的控制項且包含 UI 的網頁。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the UI. 請注意，宣告式``區域中的項目設定特定的文字表示的動詞命令功能表中的關閉動詞命令控制項。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the close verb in the verbs menu for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 也請注意，因為基礎的自訂控制項，名為`TextDisplayWebPart`-用於程式碼範例會設定屬性設`false`在其建構函式，``目錄中的項目必須設定屬性為`true`，如此一來，控制項可以關閉下列程式碼範例。Notice also that, because the underlying custom control--named `TextDisplayWebPart`-- used in the code example sets the property to `false` in its constructor, the `` element in the catalog must set the property to `true`, so that the control can be closed in the following code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#3)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並新增`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項加入網頁。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page. 您可以使用核取方塊，啟用和停用的關閉動詞命令，而您可以按一下**關閉 網頁組件**關閉控制項的動詞命令功能表中的動詞命令。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the close verb, and you can click the **Close WebPart** verb in the verbs menu to close the control. 如果頁面返回目錄顯示模式，則會關閉該控制項之後，您可以按一下**網頁型錄**，選取的原始執行個體`TextDisplayWebPart`控制您關閉，並重新開啟它的上。After you close the control, if you return the page to catalog display mode, you can click the **Page Catalog**, select the original instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control that you closed, and reopen it on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 終端使用者關閉的典型方式控制項，請按一下控制項的標題列中的關閉動詞命令。The typical way for an end user to close a control is by clicking the close verb in the control's title bar. 方法呼叫方法類別，可執行的動作關閉控制項。The method calls the method on the class, which carries out the action of closing the control. 方法應該只能由衍生這類區域。The method should only be used by derived zones such as . 關閉控制項不會呈現在頁面上。A closed control is not rendered on a page. 相反地，它會加入頁面目錄中，會維護所有已關閉的控制項，在頁面上的清單。Instead, it is added to the page catalog, which maintains a list of all closed controls on a page. 如果 Web 組件頁面使用者關閉控制項也有``項目宣告，使用者就可以將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並將已關閉的控制項新增至頁面。If a Web Parts page on which a user closes a control also has an `` element declared with a , then the user can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the closed control back to the page. > [!NOTE] > 若要能夠關閉使用者控制項，控制項上的屬性和對區域的屬性必須同時設定為`true`。For a user to be able to close a control, the property on the control and the property on the zone must both be set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底方法來建立一組區域中所包含的控制項。The method overrides the base method to create the set of controls contained in a zone. 這是當 Web 組件頁面處於設計模式中，因為可以在設計模式中變更控制項在頁面上 （與區域內） 的配置。This occurs when the Web Parts page is in design mode, because the layout of the controls on the page (and within zones) can be changed in design mode. 一組必須同樣地適應順序或相符的區域中控制項的項目中可能發生的變更建立區域內的控制項。The set of controls within a zone must likewise be created to accommodate possible changes in the order or occurrence of controls in the zone.

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法來設定一些特定的屬性上建立的樣式，請勿使用建構函式，因此您必須將控制項傳遞版本物件做為參數，導致建立物件共用與區域控制項。

This causes rendering problems.

summary.span: 在為衍生自 類別的區域建立動詞命令時發生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網頁程式開發人員可以將處理常式新增至這個事件，並附加額外的自訂動詞命令，以子區域。Page developers can add a handler to this event, and attach additional custom verbs to a child zone. 區域中，建立動詞命令時，會引發事件期間恰好頁面處理，或在回傳事件期間的階段。The event is raised when the verbs are created for a zone, which happens either during the stage of page processing, or during postback events. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的方式建立的處理常式藉由覆寫事件方法將自訂動詞命令加入至衍生區域。The following code example demonstrates a way to create a handler for the event by overriding the method to add a custom verb to a derived zone. 在程式碼範例包含兩個原始程式檔。The code example contains two source files. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說：開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 程式碼範例的第一個部分是簡單的控制項衍生自原始碼類別。The first part of the code example is the source code for a simple control derived from the class. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/SimpleControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/SimpleControl.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是針對衍生的原始程式碼會覆寫的區域方法，以將自訂的指令動詞新增至區域。The second part of the code example is the source code for a derived zone that overrides the method to add a custom verb to the zone. 程式碼也會出現自訂動詞命令建立動詞命令功能表中的在區域中，包含控制項和動詞命令會建立另一份目前控制項。The code also creates a custom verb that appears in the verbs menu of controls contained in the zone, and the verb creates another copy of the current control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是裝載衍生的區域的網頁和控制項。The third part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the derived zone and control. 頁面頂端附近`Register`指示詞來參考衍生的區域元件。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive to reference the derived zone component. 如果瀏覽器中，將頁面載入控制項就會出現在區域中。If you load the page in a browser, the control appears in the zone. 按一下 動作 功能表，然後按一下 **CopyWebPart**動詞，以及它會建立控制項的複本。Click the verbs menu, then click the **CopyWebPart** verb, and it creates a copy of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 讓衍生區域能夠取代自訂的 物件，以變更區域中 控制項的外觀。

span.span: Enables derived zones to substitute a custom object to change the appearance of controls in a zone.

returns.span: ，決定區域中 控制項呈現的方式。

span.span: A that determines how controls in a zone are rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個畫面格的週邊使用者介面 (UI) 項目是指 web 組件 chrome區域中的控制項。Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each control in a zone. 針對 chrome控制項包括框線、 標題列，和圖示、 標題文字和出現在標題列的動詞命令功能表。The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar. 色彩的外觀會在區域層級設定，且適用於所有區域中的控制項。The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all controls in a zone. > [!IMPORTANT] > 物件會影響整個呈現控制項，不只是其 chrome 的項目。The object affects the entire rendering of the controls, not merely their chrome elements. 若要使用方法，您必須建立自訂物件來定義區域中的 Web 組件控制項的 chrome 的外觀。To use the method, you must create a custom object to define the appearance of the chrome for Web Parts controls in a zone. 您也必須建立自訂的區域，繼承自類別並覆寫能夠取代自訂的 chrome 物件，並將它套用至區域中控制項的方法。You must also create a custom zone that inherits from the class and overrides the method to be able to substitute your custom chrome object and apply it to the controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所參考的 delete 動詞屬性會出現在每個動態的標題列中動詞命令下拉式選單區域中的控制項。The delete verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each dynamic control in a zone. Delete 動詞並不適用於靜態控制項 （控制項之 Web 網頁標記中宣告）。The delete verb is not available on static controls (controls declared in the markup of the Web page). 動詞命令會顯示在動詞命令功能表中只有當頁面處於顯示模式，可讓您變更頁面配置，這類或。The verb appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in a display mode that enables you to change the page layout, such as or . 永久刪除控制項，是在頁面中移除該控制項的執行個體。Deleting a control permanently removes the instance of that control from a page. 不同於已關閉的控制項，控制項的已刪除執行個體永遠不能加回到頁面。Unlike a closed control, a deleted instance of a control can never be added back to a page. 當使用者刪除控制項，並再切換到網頁的話區域包含控制項中，已刪除的控制項執行個體不提供它。When a user deletes a control, and then switches a page into , if the zone contains a control, the deleted control instance is not available in it. 如果控制項可供在目錄中，但已永久移除已刪除的執行個體，使用者可以新增控制項的新執行個體。The user can add a new instance of a control, if the control is available in the catalog, but the deleted instance has been permanently removed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 此程式碼範例才能運作，您需要的範例區段的所有程式碼屬性。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 程式碼範例的下列部分是部分類別中，從，並包含切換 delete 動詞命令為啟用或停用的程式碼。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the delete verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 在程式碼範例中的其他部分是裝載自訂的控制項且包含使用者介面 (UI) 的網頁。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 請注意，宣告式``區域中的項目設定特定的文字，表示在動詞命令下拉式功能表的 delete 動詞控制項。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the delete verb in the verbs drop-down menu for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並新增`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項加入網頁。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page. 您可以使用核取方塊來啟用和停用 delete 動詞`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，但是此動詞命令時，會出現在功能表上只網頁為目錄或設計的顯示模式。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the delete verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, but the verb appears on the menu only while the page is in catalog or design display mode. 如果您按一下**刪除網頁組件**功能表上的動詞命令，永久刪除控制項，並已刪除的執行個體無法加入至頁面。If you click the **Delete WebPart** verb on the menu, the control is permanently deleted, and the deleted instance cannot be added back to the page. 不過，您可以將頁面傳回至目錄的顯示模式，並將新增的新執行個體`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。However, you can return the page to catalog display mode, and add a new instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所參考的編輯動詞上的屬性控制項可讓使用者切換控制項進入編輯模式，其中使用者可以將個人化外觀、 屬性、 配置和控制項的內容區域中。The edit verb referenced by the property on a control enables an end user to switch a control in the zone into edit mode, where the user can personalize the appearance, properties, layout, and content of the control. 相同的編輯動詞命令用於區域中的所有控制項。The same edit verb is used for all controls in a zone. 當 Web 組件頁面進入編輯顯示模式 ()，編輯動詞命令變成可見的動詞命令功能表中的每個區所包含的控制項。When a Web Parts page enters into the edit display mode (), the edit verb becomes visible in the verbs menu of each control contained in the zone. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的宣告式用法屬性上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 請注意，屬性會以宣告方式使用來存取``具有項目`WebPartZone1`控制項。Note that the property is accessed declaratively by using the `` element with the `WebPartZone1` control. 編輯動詞命令會出現在這個控制項處於編輯模式，即使您未使用``項目，但使用它，您可以設定它的一些屬性，例如的文字表示的使用者介面 (UI) 中的動詞命令。An edit verb would be present on this control in edit mode even if you did not use the `` element here, but by using it, you can set some of its attributes, such as the text that represents the verb in the user interface (UI). 完整的程式碼範例中，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會取得最初的沒有預先存在的範本或其他形式的決定控制項的區域中的儲存體時，才會控制區域。The method gets the initial collection of controls for a zone only if there is a preexisting template or other form of storage that determines what controls are in the zone. 此方法不會反映任何個人化變更，可能表示的初始集合中的控制項實際上已移使用者到另一個區域。The method does not reflect any personalization changes, which might mean that controls in the initial collection have actually been moved by a user into another zone. 初始集合區域中的控制項不一定與集合中包含相同的區域，轉譯頁面時，取得反映實際的目前集合的區域中控制項的屬性為帳戶所做的任何個人化變更。The initial collection of controls in the zone are not necessarily the same as the collection contained in the property of the zone, which reflects the actual current collection of controls in the zone when a page is rendered, taking into account any personalization changes that have been made.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可以存取屬性，以宣告方式或以程式設計的方式。The property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically. 您可以存取以宣告方式在區域內使用``項目來設定文字、 描述、 是否啟用此動詞命令，以及其他屬性。You can access it declaratively within a zone by using the `` element to set the text, the description, whether the verb is enabled, and other attributes. 因為預設會啟用，所以不需要宣告區域，不過，說明動詞命令。It is not necessary to declare a help verb for a zone, however, because it is enabled by default. 必要時啟用的動詞命令功能表上出現的說明動詞命令的唯一步驟在執行階段區域中的控制項是將值指派給個別控制項。The only step that is necessary to enable a help verb to appear on the verbs menu of controls in a zone at run time is to assign a value to the property for individual controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 若要運作，除了下列的程式碼，程式碼範例中，您需要自訂控制項。For the code example to work, in addition to the following code, you need a custom control. 您可以使用您自己的控制項，或使用自訂程式碼`TextDisplayWebPart`的範例 > 一節中找到的控制項類別概觀。You can either use your own control, or use the code for the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` control found in the Example section of the class overview. 此程式碼範例也包含使用者控制項，讓您變更網頁上的顯示模式。This code example includes a user control to enable you to change display modes on a Web page. 如需有關顯示模式，此控制項中的原始碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說：變更顯示模式，在 Web 組件頁面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#10)] 此程式碼範例也包含可能包含說明內容的 HTML 網頁`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。This code example also includes an HTML page that could contain Help content for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須將下列程式碼儲存在名為 Textwebparthelp.htm 檔案，並將它放在您的站台裝載的.aspx 頁面與相同的目錄`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。For this example to work, you must save the following code in a file named Textwebparthelp.htm and place it in the same directory of your site as the .aspx page that hosts the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. ``` Text Content WebPart Help

Text Content WebPart Help

To make the WebPart control work...
``` 在程式碼範例也會包含下列部分類別，其中包含程式碼來處理.aspx 網頁中的事件。The code example also includes the following partial class that contains the code to handle the events in the .aspx page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#4)] 在程式碼範例的其他部分是裝載的.aspx 網頁`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，並示範如何使用屬性。The other part of the code example is the .aspx page that hosts the `TextDisplayWebPart` control and demonstrates the use of the property. 請注意，頁面上，頂端附近`<@ Register %>`宣告用來參考已編譯`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，這應該放在名為 Bin 子資料夾。Notice that near the top of the page, an `<@ Register %>` declaration is used to reference the compiled `TextDisplayWebPart` control, which should be placed in a subfolder named Bin. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#1)] 也請注意，屬性用於以宣告方式``的文字設為動詞命令，如下列程式碼範例所示的項目。Also note that the property is used declaratively on the `` element to set the text for the verb, as shown in the following code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 最後，請注意下列的程式碼範例中，屬性設定``項目提供的說明檔的 URL。Finally, note in the following code example that the property is set on the `` element to provide the URL to the Help file. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#3)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請按一下**目錄模式**中的功能表項目**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項的網頁切換成類別目錄的顯示模式。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Catalog Mode** menu item in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page into catalog display mode. 新增`TextDisplayWebPart`控制頁面、 關閉 類別目錄，以及讓頁面返回標準瀏覽模式。Add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, close the catalog, and return the page to normal browse mode. 如果您按一下標題列中的動詞命令下拉式選單`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，您可以存取說明動詞命令，以開啟 [說明] 頁面。If you click the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, you can access the help verb to open the Help page.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出區域中的控制項是垂直排列或是水平排列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether controls in a zone are arranged vertically or horizontally.

value.span: 值，決定區域中控制項的排列方式。

span.span: An value that determines how controls in a zone are arranged.

value.span: 預設方向是 。

span.span: The default orientation is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您考量 Web 組件控制項的區域中的配置方式。The property concerns how Web Parts controls are laid out in a zone. 預設值方向控制項呈現的由上到下排列方式，根據每個控制項的值。With the default orientation, the controls are rendered in a top-to-bottom arrangement, according to the value of each control. 使用方向，控制項的排列，並排顯示，視該區域的寬度。With a orientation, the controls are arranged side by side, subject to the width of the zone. Internet Explorer 蝭 的高度控制項，以及包含該區域的高度。Internet Explorer can affect the height of a control, and the height of the zone that contains it. Internet Explorer 呈現網頁在相容性模式下 （與舊版瀏覽器的回溯相容），或以標準模式 (取決於是否存在`DOCTYPE`頁面中的宣告)。Internet Explorer renders web pages either in compatibility mode (backward compatible with previous browser versions), or in standards mode (determined by the presence of a `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page). 如需這些模式的詳細資訊，請參閱 DHTML [compatMode](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175)屬性。For information about these modes, see the DHTML [compatMode](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) property. 當 Internet Explorer 呈現標準模式中的頁面時，在某些情況下它不會不調整大小儲存格在資料表中，即使儲存格的 HTML 標記是``。When Internet Explorer renders a page in standards mode, in some scenarios it does not resize cells in tables, even when a cell's HTML markup is ``. 如此一來，控制項和其包含的區域會呈現，讓控制項執行自動縮放為完整高度的區域。As a result, controls and their containing zone are rendered so that the controls do not stretch to the full height of the zone. 在兩個情況下，就會發生這種類型的轉譯。This type of rendering occurs in two cases. - 當區域屬性設定為，並明確地將高度設區域。When a zone's property is set to , and you explicitly set the height on the zone. 若要啟用控制項，以填滿區域的完整高度，請勿指定水平區域的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, do not specify the height of a horizontal zone. - 當區域屬性設定為，且未明確設定的區域 （或包含的控制項） 的高度。When a zone's property is set to , and you do not explicitly set the height of the zone (or of the contained controls). 若要啟用控制項，以填滿區域的完整高度，垂直區域中來設定或控制項的區域高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, set the height of the zone or of the controls in a vertical zone. 本主題的程式碼範例示範一般的使用方式的屬性。The code example in this topic demonstrates normal usage of the property. 示範高度相關的轉譯問題，以及如何解決之道的程式碼範例，請參閱屬性。For a code example that demonstrates the height-related rendering issue and how to work around it, see the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用屬性上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative and programmatic use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例中，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 請注意，屬性有值，指派給它的宣告式標記中。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 這個值會影響`WebPartZone1`之後瀏覽器中載入頁面。This value impacts `WebPartZone1`, after you load the page into a browser. 水平呈現區域中的 Web 組件控制項。The Web Parts controls in the zone are rendered horizontally. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview_vb.aspx#2)] 您可以按一下**切換版面配置方向**按鈕來變更區域的方向。You can click the **Toggle Layout Orientation** button to change the orientation of the zone. 切換方向的程式碼就會發生在下列程式碼範例從部分類別。The code to toggle the orientation occurs in the following code example from the partial class. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview.cs#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，您可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, you can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法會覆寫基底方法來載入狀態，該動詞命令與區域中的動詞命令功能表衍生自類別。The method overrides the base method to load state for the verbs and the verbs menu in a zone derived from the class.

summary.span: 取得樣式屬性，這些屬性會套用至動詞命令功能表上已選取動詞命令文字旁邊的核取記號影像。

span.span: Gets style attributes that are applied to the check mark image that appears on a verbs menu next to the selected verb text.

value.span: ，包含動詞命令功能表中核取記號影像的樣式屬性。

span.span: A that contains the style attributes for check mark images in a verbs menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會套用自訂時具有動詞命令功能表中的物件及其屬性值設定為`true`。The property applies only when there is a custom object in a verbs menu that has its property value set to `true`. 中所包含的樣式屬性功能表中的動詞命令的文字旁邊出現核取記號影像的樣式相關屬性。The style attributes contained in the property pertain to the style of the check mark image that appears next to the verb's text in the menu. 每個控制在區域就會在其標題列中有它自己的動詞命令功能表。Each control in a zone has its own verbs menu in its title bar. 動詞命令功能表可包含這兩個包含在 Web 組件控制項集合及自訂的標準動詞開發人員所建立的物件。The verbs menu can contain both standard verbs included in the Web Parts control set, and custom objects created by developers. 中的標準動詞控制動詞命令功能表-包括匯出、 刪除和開啟說明的動詞命令執行其工作一次且明確的單一動作動詞完成頁面。The standard verbs in a control verbs menu--including the verbs for exporting, deleting, and opening a Help page--are single-action verbs that carry out their tasks once and are done. 曾經將標記在功能表中的核取記號，這些動詞命令需要因為沒有一個指出持續狀態的任何排序。There is no need to ever mark these verbs in the menu with a check mark, because none of them indicate any sort of continuing state. 因此，無法設定這些動詞命令上的屬性，而屬性不會完全套用它們。Therefore, the property on these verbs cannot be set, and the property does not apply to them at all. 不過，開發人員可以建立自訂可能表示藉由設定的核取記號的持續狀態的控制項及其屬性設`true`。However, developers can create a custom control that might indicate a continuing state with a check mark, by setting its property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會影響整個區域中的每個 Web 組件控制項中的動詞命令功能表標籤的樣式。The property affects the style of the entire label for the verbs menu in each Web Parts control in a zone. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的宣告式用法屬性上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例中，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 請注意，屬性有值，指派給它的宣告式標記中。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 這個值會影響`WebPartZone2`。This value impacts `WebPartZone2`. 瀏覽器中載入頁面後，將頁面切換到編輯模式，並將您的滑鼠指標放在 Web 組件控制項的動詞命令功能表。After you load the page into a browser, switch the page into edit mode, and position your mouse pointer over the verbs menu of the Web Parts control. 請注意，標籤的文字會變成粗體。Notice that the text of the label turns bold. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中包含的樣式資訊屬性會套用至動詞命令功能表中的個別動詞命令，當使用者將滑鼠指標置於動詞命令的其中一個。The style information contained in the property applies to an individual verb in a verbs menu, when a user positions a mouse pointer over one of the verbs. 雖然這個屬性是唯讀的您可以設定基礎的樣式屬性物件。Although this property is read-only, you can set the style attributes of the underlying object. 因為使用 Microsoft Internet Explorer 的快顯的物件來建立包含動詞命令的功能表時，功能表不會正確轉譯框線當滑鼠指標置於動詞命令具有不同的文字長度。Because the menu that contains the verbs is created using Microsoft Internet Explorer's pop-up object, the menu does not correctly render its border when you place your mouse pointer over verbs that have different text lengths. 這個最佳的解決方法是將宣告``元素不可見的框線，因此所有動詞命令的功能表寬度是完全相同的大小。The best workaround for this is to declare a `` element with an invisible border, so the menu width for all verbs is exactly the same size. 宣告式項目區域內，會發生，且看起來如下：The declarative element would occur within a zone, and would look as follows: ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的宣告式用法屬性上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例中，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 請注意，屬性有值，指派給它的宣告式標記中。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 這個值會影響`WebPartZone2`。This value impacts `WebPartZone2`. 瀏覽器中載入頁面後，切換頁面進入編輯模式。After you load the page into a browser, switch the page into edit mode. 按一下動詞命令功能表中，並請注意，在控制項上的動詞命令功能表的背景色彩`WebPartZone2`是指派給它的宣告式標記中的色彩。Click the verbs menu, and notice that the background color for the verbs menu on the control in `WebPartZone2` is the color assigned to it in the declarative markup. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所參考的最小化動詞屬性會出現在每個動詞命令功能表區域中的控制項。The minimize verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs menu of each control in a zone. 動詞會出現在所有的網頁顯示模式。The verb appears in all page display modes. 最小化控制項將它摺疊放到較小的大小，離開只有標題列控制項的可見，並還原動詞命令的標題列中顯示。Minimizing a control collapses it down to a smaller size, leaves only the title bar of the control visible, and makes a restore verb visible in the title bar. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 此程式碼範例才能運作，您需要的範例區段的所有程式碼屬性。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 程式碼範例的下列部分會是部分類別中，來自，且包含切換啟用或停用最小化動詞命令的程式碼。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the minimize verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 在程式碼範例的其他部分是裝載自訂的網頁控制項且包含使用者介面 (UI)。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 請注意，宣告式``區域中的項目設定的值`Description`屬性當使用者將滑鼠指標置於動詞命令功能表中的動詞命令時，會顯示為工具提示的文字。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the value for the `Description` attribute text, which appears as a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the verb in the verbs menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並新增`TextDisplayWebPart`控制權傳輸至頁面上，如果它尚未加入。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, if it has not been added. 您可以使用核取方塊來啟用和停用的最小化動詞`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the minimize verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 啟用此動詞命令時，您也可以按一下，以減少控制項。When the verb is enabled, you can also click it to minimize the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫方法中衍生區域來新增其他類別的區域中的標準動詞命令集合的物件。You can override the method in a derived zone class to add additional objects to the collection of standard verbs in your zone. 您可以藉由新增至集合中的動詞命令屬性。You can do this by adding verbs to the collection in the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的方式建立的處理常式藉由覆寫事件方法將自訂動詞命令加入至衍生區域。The following code example demonstrates a way to create a handler for the event by overriding the method to add a custom verb to a derived zone. 在程式碼範例包含兩個原始程式檔。The code example contains two source files. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說：開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 程式碼範例的第一個部分是簡單的控制項衍生自原始碼類別。The first part of the code example is the source code for a simple control derived from the class. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/SimpleControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/SimpleControl.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是針對衍生的原始程式碼會覆寫的區域方法，以將自訂的指令動詞新增至區域。The second part of the code example is the source code for a derived zone that overrides the method to add a custom verb to the zone. 程式碼也會出現自訂動詞命令建立動詞命令功能表中的在區域中，包含控制項和動詞命令會建立另一份目前控制項。The code also creates a custom verb that appears in the verbs menu of controls contained in the zone, and the verb creates another copy of the current control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是裝載衍生的區域的網頁和控制項。The third part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the derived zone and control. 頁面頂端附近`Register`指示詞來參考衍生的區域元件。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive to reference the derived zone component. 如果瀏覽器中，將頁面載入控制項就會出現在區域中。If you load the page in a browser, the control appears in the zone. 按一下 動作 功能表，然後按一下 **CopyWebPart**動詞，以及它會建立控制項的複本。Click the verbs menu, then click the **CopyWebPart** verb, and it creates a copy of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呈現的區域，這是在頁首和頁尾區域之間的主要內容區域，並包含主體區域控制項。The method renders the body area of a zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains controls. 方法會覆寫中的基底方法類別，以提供位址配置和樣式的特製化的呈現屬性 (attribute) 套用至唯一區域。The method overrides the base method in the class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply uniquely to zones. 此方法會呈現資料表，其中包含本文中，整個內容，並在該資料表中，設定不同的屬性值，依據各種條件，包括是否屬性設定為垂直或水平，以及頁面目前正在設計的顯示模式。The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including whether the property is set to vertical or horizontal, and whether the page is currently in design display mode.

[!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 在程式碼範例的其他部分是裝載自訂的網頁控制項且包含使用者介面 (UI)。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 請注意，宣告式``區域中的項目設定的值`Description`屬性當使用者將滑鼠指標置於動詞命令功能表中的動詞命令時，會顯示為工具提示的文字。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the value for the `Description` attribute text, which appears as a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the verb in the verbs menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並新增`TextDisplayWebPart`控制權傳輸至頁面上，如果它尚未加入。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, if it has not been added. 使用最小化控制項，並記下的還原指令動詞會變成可見的最小化動詞。Use the minimize verb to minimize the control, and note that the restore verb becomes visible. 您可以使用核取方塊，啟用和停用還原動詞命令。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the restore verb.

summary.span: 取得或設定按鈕類型，以舊版瀏覽器進行存取時，該按鈕與存在於 區域中的動詞命令相關聯。

span.span: A that determines what kind of button is associated with the verbs in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件動詞代表使用者可以在 Web 組件頁面上，例如最小化、 關閉或還原的控制項; 使用者介面 (UI) 中執行的動作將控制項加入頁面的或取消動作。Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action. 動詞由在 UI 中的可點按的物件，您可以將它設定為使用會顯示為超連結、 影像或按鈕屬性。A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button by using the property. 屬性會套用到只存在於區域層級，而不是存在於每個的動詞命令的指令動詞區域中的控制項。The property applies to verbs that exist only at the zone level, as opposed to verbs that exist in each of the controls in a zone. 比方說，當您切換至目錄模式或編輯模式的頁面，有區域層次動詞命令只適用於動作層級的整個區域的區域的頁尾中。For example, when you switch a page into catalog mode or edit mode, there are zone-level verbs in the footers of the zones that apply only to actions at the level of the entire zone. 與較舊的 （「 舊版 」） 瀏覽器存取 Web 組件頁面時，會套用屬性。The property is applied when the Web Parts page is accessed with an older ("down-level") browser. 您必須指派值給造成才會出現在其區域中動詞的映像的每個特定動作的屬性。You must assign a value to the property for each specific verb to cause an image to appear for that verb in its zone. 如果您未提供影像的 URL，動詞命令的屬性會預設為。If you do not provide the URL to an image, the verb's property defaults to . 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可包含直接繼承的控制項的參考類別，以及其他 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項或區域內的自訂控制項。The property can contain references to controls that inherit directly from the class, as well as other ASP.NET server controls or custom controls within a zone. 動態設定的 Web 組件控制項包裝不是任何控制項控制項作為控制在執行階段; 這項機制可讓您使用做為 Web 組件控制項的所有類型的 ASP.NET 控制項。The Web Parts control set dynamically wraps any control that is not a control as a control at run time; this mechanism enables you to use all types of ASP.NET controls as Web Parts controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property on a control. 完整的程式碼範例中，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 下列程式碼範例存取屬性以程式設計的方式，並顯示清單中所包含之控制項的`WebPartZone1`。The following code example accesses the property programmatically and displays a list of the controls contained in `WebPartZone1`. 瀏覽器中載入頁面後，按一下 按鈕**清單 WebPartZone1 WebParts**。After you load the page into a browser, click the button labeled **List WebPartZone1 WebParts**. 顯示的識別碼和類型的控制項。The IDs and types of the controls are displayed. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview.cs#8)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否在動詞區域中的控制項呈現在標題列中的控制項，或下拉式動詞命令功能表中。The property determines whether verbs on controls in a zone are rendered in the title bar of the controls, or in a drop-down verbs menu. 如果動詞命令呈現在標題列中，您也可以設定和變更的動詞命令外觀的屬性。If the verbs are to be rendered in the title bar, you can also set the and properties to change the appearance of the verbs.
